title: WOMAN’S WORLD

description.plain:
“Woman’s World” is the lead single from Katy Perry’s highly anticipated sixth studio album, 143. The song was formally announced on 17 June 2024 alongside a short snippet of the song. The song serves as a powerful anthem that celebrates and affirms the growing prominence of women in society and their influence in the modern world.

Katy first teased the name and lyrics on 6 March 2024 during her speech presenting the Executive Of The Year Award to Michelle Jubelirer at Billboard’s Women In Music event

Look, I feel like under this roof, I can safely say it’s a woman’s world and you’re lucky to be living in it.

Katy had also been teasing a new era on TikTok months before by reacting to fan’s videos and hinting at a brand new album using her 2010 track, “Teenage Dream”

embed_content: Read “WOMAN'S WORLD” by Katy Perry on Genius

body.plain:
“Woman’s World” is the lead single from Katy Perry’s highly anticipated sixth studio album, 143. The song was formally announced on 17 June 2024 alongside a short snippet of the song. The song serves as a powerful anthem that celebrates and affirms the growing prominence of women in society and their influence in the modern world.

Katy first teased the name and lyrics on 6 March 2024 during her speech presenting the Executive Of The Year Award to Michelle Jubelirer at Billboard’s Women In Music event

Look, I feel like under this roof, I can safely say it’s a woman’s world and you’re lucky to be living in it.

Katy had also been teasing a new era on TikTok months before by reacting to fan’s videos and hinting at a brand new album using her 2010 track, “Teenage Dream”

The song was formally announced on 17 June 2024 alongside a short snippet of the song. The song serves as a… Read More 
(It's a woman's world and you're lucky to be livin' in it)

Sexy, confident
So intelligent
She is heaven-sent
So soft, so strong

She's a winner, champion
Superhuman, number one
She's a sister, she's a mother
Open your eyes, just look around and you'll discover, you know

It's a woman's world and you're lucky to be livin' in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh)
It's a woman's world and you're lucky to be livin' in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh)
You better celebrate
'Cause, baby, we ain't goin' away (Oh)
It's a woman's world and you're lucky to be livin' in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh)

Fire in her eyes
Feminine divine
She was born to shine
To shine, to shine, yeah

She's a flower, she's a thorn
Superhuman, number one
She's a sister, she's a mother
Open your eyes, just look around and you'll discover, you know

It's a woman's world and you're lucky to be livin' in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh)
It's a woman's world and you're lucky to be livin' in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh; you better)
You better celebrate (Celebrate)
'Cause, baby, we ain't goin' away (Oh)
It's a woman's world and you're lucky to be livin' in it (Uh-huh)

Lucky to be livin' in it
(Woo, uh-huh)
Lucky to be livin' in it
That's right
It's a woman's world (Uh-huh)
And you're lucky to be livin' in it
(Uh-huh)
